channel.title: Changing xp rate? 508
channel.description: I know this has been ask 10000 times, but None of them seem to work? everyone says in client.java? is that in source, cuz i looked in source and there was no client.java, there is 1 in the client, but that doesn't make sense? changing xp in the client? so i need help someone, this is a 508 and the source might be palido i think? most likely but can someone please help me
